name: Break `em
description:
In this game you play as a cat(?) who bring chaos into people`s lifes by destroying everything in their houses

break stuff to get points, if you get more points than the goal of the level is, you complete the level. complete each, and there will be a lil` surprise on each level ;)

pro tip: you can break stuff with your bare paw 

Controls are in the main menu in top left corner.
